title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: By accessing and using the Smart Health System, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and all applicable laws and regulations.

title: 2. Medical Professional Requirements
list: Hold valid medical licenses or certifications as required by their role
Maintain current professional credentials throughout their system usage
Provide accurate and up-to-date professional information
Notify administrators of any changes in professional status

title: 3. Patient Data and Privacy
list: Comply with HIPAA regulations and data protection laws
Maintain patient confidentiality at all times
Access patient data only when medically necessary
Report any data breaches or security concerns immediately

title: 4. System Usage
list: Use the system only for legitimate medical purposes
Maintain secure login credentials
Log out after each session
Not share access credentials with others

title: 5. Program Management
content: When creating and managing health programs:
list: Ensure accuracy of all program information
Follow established clinical guidelines
Maintain proper documentation
Update program status regularly

title: 6. Professional Conduct
list: Maintain professional standards of care
Respect patient rights and dignity
Collaborate professionally with colleagues
Report unethical behavior

title: 7. System Availability
list: May undergo scheduled maintenance
Does not guarantee 100% uptime
Will provide notice of planned outages
Maintains backup systems for critical functions

title: 8. Liability
list: The system is a tool to assist healthcare delivery
Clinical decisions remain the responsibility of healthcare providers
The system is not a replacement for professional judgment
Users maintain professional liability insurance

title: 9. Termination
content: The Smart Health System reserves the right to:
list: Suspend or terminate access for violations
Modify terms with notice to users
Report violations to appropriate authorities

title: 10. Updates and Changes
list: Review terms periodically for updates
Comply with new requirements when posted
Maintain current contact information
